snippet.title: Riven Introduction
snippet.description:
Includes the logo sequence, but not the part on riven.
The two movie files were joined with a software called "Movie Joiner".  I tried to join the third part of the introduction, on Riven.  However, it took much longer to do so, and after youtube had processed it, the video was playing twice as fast as the sound!  I'm guessing it's because the video on Riven is encoded differently.
